description: Drag this card to a commit or to a branch to travel to it!

Make a new commit containing your current environment!
Drag this card anywhere. You'll be asked to enter a short description of what you changed.
Merge the specified timeline into yours.
Put the events in your current timeline on top of the specified one.
Make changes to the events in your current timeline, back to the commit you drag this to.
Move the branch you're on to the specified commit.
Repeat the specified action on top of your current timeline.
